V

verifyCredentials(String, String) - Method in class Users.Pearson
Function: this method verify, thanks to the user's file, the authenticity of a user, checking the mail and the password and classifying him as a costumer or as a administrator.
verifyExisting(String) - Method in class DB.Airports.IOAirports
Function: it's used to check the existence of an airport within the database.
verifyExisting(String[], int) - Method in class DB.Tickets.IOTickets
Function: it's used to check the existence of a ticket within the database, using the information of the ticket itself.
verifyExisting(String, String, String) - Method in class DB.Tickets.IOTickets
Function: it's used to check the existence of a ticket within the database, using ID, user's mail and number of bought ticket.
verifyMailUser(String) - Method in class DB.Users.IOUsers
Function: it's used to verifying the existence of a specific mail within the database.
verifyPasswordUser(String, String) - Method in class DB.Users.IOUsers
Function: it's used to verifying the existence of a specific password for a specific mail within the database.
verifyUserType(int) - Method in class DB.Users.IOUsers
Function: it's used to verifying the existence the type of user that is using the application (costumer or administrator).
